title: Fix manual dispatch for Discord workflow
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: The Discord notification workflow now supports manual triggering by fetching PR details directly from the GitHub API.
gist.impact: Maintainers can reliably dispatch social workflows manually without encountering missing environment variable errors.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot connecting glowing wires on a tiny retro server rack. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky 8-bit sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'workflow fixed'. Emotionally warm, nostalgic.
